class Serialise a where
  • encode ∷ a → Encoding
  • decode ∷ Decoder s a
  • encodeList ∷ [a] → Encoding
  • decodeList ∷ Decoder s [a]
name: Serialise encode decode decodeList encodeList

  • = PickFirst
  • | PickAll
  • | PickSome (Set peeraddr)

data AbsBearerInfo = AbsBearerInfo {
  • abiConnectionDelay ∷ !AbsDelay
  • abiInboundAttenuation ∷ !AbsAttenuation
  • abiOutboundAttenuation ∷ !AbsAttenuation
  • abiInboundWriteFailure ∷ !(Maybe Int)
  • abiOutboundWriteFailure ∷ !(Maybe Int)
  • abiSDUSize ∷ !AbsSDUSize
}
name: AbsBearerInfo AbsBearerInfo abiConnectionDelay abiInboundAttenuation abiOutboundAttenuation abiInboundWriteFailure abiOutboundWriteFailure abiSDUSize
